note.p: Career: Demonstrator in Chemistry, University Laboratory, Oxford; Member Research Staff, Ministry of Munitions (1915-1918)
AssocMaterial: CSAC 21/15/74; NCUACS 12/15/74. Papers deposited in the Library, Lincoln College, Oxford
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1954 vol 9 pp 237-258, plate, by H T Tizard
References: B Bleaney, FRS, 'Two Oxford science Professors, F Soddy and JSE Townsend' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 83-88, plate
